Package ktt.lib.httpserver

Class RequestHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • ktt.lib.httpserver.RequestHandler

    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FilePostHandler, FilePreHandler, PredicateHandler, RedirectHandler
    public abstract class RequestHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements Authenticator
    This class is a simplified implementation of HttpHandler.
    A handler used to process HTTP exchanges.

    • Method Detail

      • handle

        public abstract void handle​(ExchangePacket packet)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Handles the given request and generates a response; returns code 500 error if no response is sent. Information from the client is provided in an ExchangePacket. Exceptions thrown are suppressed by the handler and will not throw a response.
        Parameters:
        packet - a packet of data containing client information
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - internal failure
        java.lang.Exception - any exceptions thrown within the handler
        Since:
        01.00.00
        See Also:
        ExchangePacket
